summary: Implemented a per-route background system via a centralized routeâ†’asset mapping and applied it in AppLayout with fixed full-screen background + consistent dark overlay; however, the diff summary does not show the required background image files being added under frontend/public/assets/generated.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the new landscape background images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and wire the route-to-background mapping to those exact filenames.
missing_requirements.reason: The mapping references the required filenames, but the diff summary does not include any added files under frontend/public/assets/generated, so existence of the required static assets cannot be confirmed from the provided changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Preloading all background images on initial mount using new Image() for each mapped background.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest/ACs require performance (no visible jank) but do not explicitly request eager preloading of all backgrounds; this is an additional implementation detail beyond stated requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a CSS transition on background-image for route changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not explicitly requested in the BuildRequest; it is an extra visual behavior.
